mcq.statement: Which of the following was NOT a sub-headline in the Los Angeles Times article about the bombing of Hawaii?

options.b: FDR Will Ask Congress About Aid Today
options.d: Fleet Speeds Out to Battle Invader

mcq.one_liner: Among the sub-headlines in the Los Angeles Times article about the bombing of Hawaii, 'City Springs to Attention' was included, while 'Victory in Europe' was not.
